entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
